references.paper_title: Contrastive behavioral similarity embeddings for generalization in reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduces a contrastive learning approach for improving the generalizability of reinforcement learning agents, which is a key concept addressed in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Representation learning with contrastive predictive coding
references.reason: This work is foundational for the contrastive learning methods used in the main paper and provides the theoretical framework for understanding the InfoNCE objective.

references.paper_title: On variational bounds of mutual information
references.reason: This paper provides crucial theoretical analysis for mutual information estimation, which is central to the SaMI objective proposed in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Towards effective context for meta-reinforcement learning: an approach based on contrastive learning
references.reason: This is a highly relevant work that uses contrastive learning for meta-reinforcement learning, proposing a method similar to that of the main paper but without the skill-aware component.

references.paper_title: Meta-world: A benchmark and evaluation for multi-task and meta reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduces a benchmark and evaluation framework for multi-task and meta-reinforcement learning, providing the experimental setup for the main paper.
